did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: "Analysis of Labor Management Relations Problems in the Offshore Operations of the East Coast Maritime Industry" by Aaron W. Warner and Alfred S. Eichner, 1966
did.origination:
Warner, Aaron W.;
Eichner, Alfred S.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Study prepared for the Maritime Administration of the United States Department of Commerce by Aaron W. Warner and Alfred S. Eichner, with James J. Healy serving as advisor. 327 pages plus appendices.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Aaron W. Warner was Professor of Economics at Columbia University. Alfred S. Eichner was Assistant Professor of Economics at Columbia University. James J. Healy was Professor of Industrial Relations at Harvard Business School.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one bound copy of "Analysis of Labor-Management Relations Problems in the Off-Shore Operations of the East Coast Maritime Industry," a study prepared for the Maritime Administration of the United States Department of Commerce by Aaron W. Warner and Alfred S. Eichner, with James J. Healy serving as advisor. The study was presented in June 1966.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: "Analysis of Labor Management Relations Problems in the Offshore Operations of the East Coast Maritime Industry" by Aaron W. Warner and Alfred S. Eichner #5793. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
